Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: is their going to be a max supply of KMD?

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: Between 160 and 200mio not fixxed as not everybody is claiming rewards

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: so circulating supply is 160million -200million and  no fixed supply?

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
Current cirulating supply is about 112mio
And at block 7'777'777 the rewards are no longer accrued. So 160m to 200m sounds like a good number.
Of course its still 12 years to go so the code can change if community supportsnit.

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: So at block 7,777,777 the total number of KMD is reflective of how many where currently out there and how many were being held collecting rewards compounded?

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: Hypothetically speaking seeing as there will be no way to account for what that would be.

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: Thats is correct no way to say now

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: Just guestimates

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: Block 7,777,777 is still 12 years out?

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: Yes 12.5 years from now

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: monthly roi correct?

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: or daily?

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: Rewards are accured by blockheight so each block or in minutes each 1 minute

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: 5% year?

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: 5% APR, which if you do each month to maximize, will become 5.1% APY

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: utxos accrue a 5% APR reward for up to 31 days, then you must collect reward, and the game starts again

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: you might find very old docs that don't have the monthly stipulation, that started at block 1M, iirc

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: so the max looks like it would be 372,446,541 assuming current circulating supply of 200mil, 5.1% APY

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: and with a 12.5 year out block height

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: i have no idea of the stats on lost KMD or KMD that never has interest collected

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: so max is most likely much larger than reality

Author: AspenShredder#5419
Content: and assuming all coins are recieving rewards which they are not

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: also, only utxos >= 10 KMD accrue rewards

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: utxos smaller than that, don't

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: so the calculation is not simple

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content:
There are a lot of utxos not claiming  I think that would be an instressting stats to do.
Rewards accrued by day month year.

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: BTW, also, utxos older than block 1M still have old reward rules. In case it wasn't complex enough üòÉ
